doc.after: Mangroves occur on the Pacific and Caribbean coasts of Belize Costa Rica El Salvador Guatemala Honduras Nicaragua and Panama Significant mangals include the Marismas Nacionales San Blas mangroves in Mexico Mangroves can also be found in many of the Antilles including Puerto Rico Cuba and Hispaniola 27 as well as other islands in the West Indies such as the Bahamas
